snippet: A wildfire in the Southern California mountains shut down some 30 miles of the famed Pacific Crest Trail and was threatening Idyllwild.
abstract: Wildfire in Southern California mountains shuts down some 30 miles of famed Pacific Crest Trail and is threatening Idyllwild, artist community and hiking destination.
lead_paragraph: A wildfire in the Southern California mountains shut down some 30 miles of the famed Pacific Crest Trail and was threatening Idyllwild.
